item.title: TIL: Default values when destructuring (ES6)
item.description: Today I learnt that you can specify default values when destructuring arrays or objects. I’ve been using desctructuring for a short time now, often using it to create variables from comma-separated values in strings. const arr = "calvin,mark,davis".split(","); const [ first, middle, last ] = arr; // first = "calvin" // middle = "mark" // last = "davis" One day it occured to me that because this is variable assignment, perhaps default values would work here.
